description:
Botanical 1,142sqm (approx.)
An English styled cottage with a beautiful established garden in the ever-popular Symonds street!
- 3 bedrooms including a sunroom to the side of the home
- Large living zone to the centre of the home
- Light and bright kitchen with an outlook over the lovely gardens. Also including large fridge space, large benches and ample cupboards.
- Modernised bathroom
- A one-bedroom bungalow with bathroom to the rear of the garage
- Large garage with remote door
- Gas ducted heating, separate gas heater, air conditioning and ceiling fans
A quiet position yet close to amenities including bus stops, train station, local shopping strips, schools, beautiful Somers beach and the Stony Point boat ramp.
For further information or to arrange your personal inspection please contact Jason Dowler anytime.
** Please note that the house itself is 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom with a separate sun room. The second bathroom is located in the bungalow to the rear of the property **

Wow! Invest and subdivide!
Either build and enjoy this fabulous ¾ acre block (3,279sqm approx.) in a central, yet peaceful location or subdivide it into 5 blocks (STCA).
- Over ¾ acre of subdividable land (STCA)
- Newly rezoned residential land
- Can be subdivided into 5 blocks (STCA)
- Please contact for a full quote for the subdivision by a local planner
- Flat and central location of Crib Point
- Live and enjoy the size or subdivide for a great investment
Contact Jason Dowler anytime for more information

When Affordability, Location & Comfort Matter!
There is so much to love here, from the generous 660sqm (approx) block, to the desirable rear-to-north facing yard, all packaged up in a very comfortable home.
An enticing investment prospect, its exceptional lifestyle address is mere footsteps from public transport, shops and leading Primary Schools.
~ Three generous bedrooms, master with triple built-in-robes.
~ Spacious lounge room with gas heating.
~ Boutique kitchen and dining space with plenty of cupboards.
~ Corner access to a single garage.
~ Generous rear yard with enough space to safely store a boat, caravan or trailer.

address: 262 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Great position, homely feel!
This cute property is situated on a huge ¼ acre block (approx.) and has a great homely feel.
- Fully fenced corner allotment
- Great living zone
- Located within a short distance to nearby shops, train station and local primary schools
Upon entry you will be greeted by the spacious living area equipped with a heater, ceiling fans and air conditioning to provide comfort all year round.
With plenty of space, inside and out, this well-maintained home offers immediate lifestyle enjoyment with a large rear yard. On offer, garden tool shed and a garage to accommodate a boat, van or trailer.
For further information or to arrange your personal inspection please contact Jason Dowler anytime!

Timeless Weatherboard Cottage With Refreshed Interiors
It will be easy to fall in love with this picture-perfect home. Set in a quiet, leafy pocket, it has been lovingly updated throughout whilst retaining all the elegance and charm of yesteryear.
In this glorious 'walk-to-everything' location you will find cafes, transport, schools and sporting grounds within minutes of the front door.
~ Spacious master bedroom offering built-in-robes and ensuite.
~ Two remaining bedrooms with built-in-robes.
~ A generous lounge room is nestled at the front of the home, whilst the open plan dining, sitting room and kitchen are positioned at the rear, showcasing a double fridge cavity, Whirlpool oven and plenty of storage space.
~ The private entertainer's deck overlooks cottage gardens and fruit trees.
~ Ducted heating throughout and split system heating & cooling in the lounge room.
~ Positioned on a corner allotment with the benefit of a double carport and side access to store a boat or trailer.
* Garden shed is not included in the sale.

address: 4/234 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Location, location, location - no body corp
Ideally located in a secure and private complex, this well presented 3 bedroom unit offers fantastic value for first home buyers, downsizers, investors or anyone after a well presented, modern unit in an even better location.
Boasting a functional and family friendly floorplan, the property offers the following features:
- Generous master bedroom with walk in robe and adjoining ensuite
- Open plan kitchen and dining area
- Well-appointed kitchen with 600mm gas cooktop, electric oven, dishwasher with ample amounts of storage space
- Central bathroom with shower, separate bath and vanity
- Ducted heating and split system heating and cooling
- 9 foot ceilings to add a sense of spaciousness
- Remote double lock up garage
Located only a stone's throw away from all that Crib Point has to offer including schools, shops, cafes, public transport and sporting clubs. Don't miss your opportunity to secure this immaculate home only moments from all amenities!

A Perfect Fit For Blended Families With Dual-Living On 1,100sqm (Approx.)
Wonderfully versatile to accommodate a family's changing needs, this unique property has been lovingly maintained and semi-modernised; meaning there is little to do except move in and enjoy this fabulous lifestyle location.
Main residence:
~ Three spacious bedrooms + master retreat offering a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan and ensuite.
~ Light filled family room with elevated ceilings + study nook.
~ An attractive open plan living, dining and kitchen is the much-loved heart of the home, boasting stainless steel appliances, LG dishwasher and a double fridge cavity.
~ Stylish main bathroom with a spa bath.
~ New flooring, ceiling fans and air-conditioning in the main living zone + ducted heating throughout.
~ Making entertaining a breeze, the sheltered alfresco integrates easily with the solar heated swimming pool, perfect for relaxed outdoor living and entertaining.
~ Double garage with front and rear roller doors.
~ Further features include 16 solar panels, two water tanks, chicken coop, two garden sheds and a workshop.
Dependents unit:
~ The master bedroom consists of an ensuite and built-in-robes.
~ Open plan living and dining space with a ceiling fan and split system heating & cooling.
~ Kitchenette with a sink and plenty of cupboard space.
~ Separately metered gas.
In a location where everything is easy to get to, it offers the opportunity to live in this central and highly sought-after suburb, where shops, schools and transport are all nearby.

address: 293 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Affordable 1/4 Acre!
Set on a massive 1,012m2 allotment (approx.) sits an original 2 bedroom cottage in the heart of Crib Point. This is a great opportunity to secure an impressive block with the option to extend, renovate or build your dream home. This could be the perfect property for a first home buyer, tradesperson or investor.
The existing residence has lots of potential offering two bedrooms, original kitchen, spacious lounge room and a separate bathroom.
The home is surrounded by mature trees and beautiful greenery and gardens giving the home added privacy. Offering a large garage/shed to the side of the home for additional car accommodation in the form of off-street parking. A spacious backyard will provide a place for kids and pets to play or the base for your future plans, with ample possibilities!
Conveniently located within a close proximity to schools, shops, public transport options and recreational reserves, this is a winning location and an opportunity not to be missed.

Family Entertainer
A true family oasis, this spacious home is situated in a court location and walking distance to local shops, schools, public transport and ammenities.
Set on a sizeable 770m2 (approx) there is plenty of room for the whole family. The heart of this home features a rumpus room with a built in bar and separate w.c. It flows through to the outdoor living space with two gazebos for outdoor dining, entertaining around the coonara and a heated in-ground spa. The large grassy back yard provides plenty of room for the kids and fur babies. There's also plenty of storage with rear shedding and veggie patches for the green thumb in the family.
Key features:
- 770m2 (approx) block
- Master bedroom w/ ensuite & walk in robe
- 3 bedrooms
- Large study that can be converted to 4th bedroom
- Multiple split systems for heating & cooling
- In-ground spa + outdoor entertaining
- Large back yard with double gated access for secure boat/trailer storage
- Veggie patches & plenty of shed space
Other key features include multiple living zones, high raked ceilings, a large open kitchen with dishwasher, 900mm stove and a wall oven + plenty of storage. A large bitumen drive providing an abundance of open parking space.
You need to see this property to truely appreciate everything it is has to offer!

description:

address: 384 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Classic Charmer
Cute, character filled and with heaps of potential this two-bedroom home is set on a manageable allotment with ample off street parking offers you the opportunity to add your own touch to this cottage.
This cosy home offers two spacious bedrooms with built in robes, a central bathroom with corner spa bath and an open plan lounge, dining and kitchen area. The kitchen comprises of an island bench, dishwasher and wall oven. Including coonara style heating and a split system for heating and cooling all year round.
The wrap around decking and undercover area flows out to the sunny backyard with ample space for a pet, landscaping or even a shed, sitting privately and peacefully behind a hedge.
Situated in the heart of Crib Point with all the local amenities just a stone throw away. Having the Crib Point local stores, public transport (bus stops and train station) with Hastings just down the Road.
For further information or to arrange an inspection please call Jason Dowler anytime.

address: 7 Stony Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
DOUBLE LOT - Total of 2021m2 (approx.) of Prime Land
Have you been dreaming of the perfect beach escape or looking for an exclusive block by the sea to build your dream home (S.T.C.A)
Handed down through family generations, this beautiful property is on the market for the first time ever and is perfectly positioned at the tip of Stony Point Road with pristine views of Western Port Bay.
The home is set on two allotments, providing you with a generous 2021m2 (approx.) of land that backs onto the historic Stony Point Railway line and is less than 100m from Stony Point foreshore reserve.
Residents of Stony Point can take advantage of the closeness to Stony Point Ferry Terminal, Stony Point Boat Ramp as well as all essential amenities in the neighbouring suburb of Crib Point.
Whether it's a home away from home or a permanent seaside residence, contact Katie Oliver on 0437 284 449 today for your chance to secure a rare beach-side property.

Modern unit with a huge yard
** THIS PROPERTY CAN BE VIEWED AT ANY TIME BY APPOINTMENT **
Positioned perfectly at the front of the unit complex, allowing a generous land size of approximately 367m2 with two private secure court yards.
- 2 Bedrooms with built in wardrobes
- Full bathroom with second access to the large master bedroom
- Single garage with full size rear roller door.
- Access to rear yard for a trailer/small boat
- Large entertainers deck
- Split system heating and cooling
- Huge second yard
The well thought out floor plan allows for a separate living space and open plan kitchen/meals/ living that looks over the tastefully landscaped gardens.
If you are an investor this home is already being well cared for by the current tenant or for those looking to downsize possession is available February 2020.
Located moments away from Cerberus two local primary schools, sporting ovals, public transport and local shops.

Promise, Potential And A Prime Position!
Wonderfully private and full of natural sunlight, this beautifully presented home offers the choice to live in as is, or re-configure and modernise the current interiors to suit your lifestyle.
Whether it's cafes, transport, schools, sporting grounds, Crib Point swimming pool or coastal walking trails, it's hard to imagine a more convenient spot where you can walk to it all!
~ Master bedroom offers a walk-in-robe, ensuite and air conditioning.
~ Open plan living and dining with gas heating and air conditioning.
~ The neat and tidy kitchen features a breakfast bar, Chef oven and plenty of storage space.
~ Spacious family bathroom with a separate shower and bath.
~ Ducted heating throughout.
~ Lovely decked alfresco overlooking passionfruit vines, veggie gardens and a variety of fruit trees.
~ Further features include a garden shed and single carport.

The Perfect Answer
This 6 bedroom home on approx 1600 sq metres is immaculately presented and has many opportunities with floor plan provided
- master with en suite and walk in robe
- stylish kitchen
- quality appliances, good - sized meals area
- Ducted heating & evaporative cooling, two split systems
- 2 living zones
- large outdoor entertaining area with direct access to kitchen/meals area
- Double remote garage, separate entrance to rear of property
- 18x6 metre shed, powered with concrete floor.
This home could be set up as dual occupancy and the outdoor garden areas are a blank canvas waiting for your own touch.
Located in the heart of Crib Point in a quiet street. Make this property part of your inspection process.

Private, but convenient
**THIS PROPERTY CAN BE INSPECTED AT ANY TIME BY APPOINTMENT**
Situated on a generous block approximately 705m2 in size and located in the leafy quaint town of Crib Point sits this 3 bedroom home. Offering the feel of a tranquil bush retreat with plenty of privacy, just waiting for you to put your stamp on it.
• Three bedrooms of ample size.
• Comfortable lounge room with gas heating and reverse cycle split system.
• Generous 6x11m shed / man cave with fully equipped bar, coonara heating, separate toilet along with enough space for your boat and trailer.
• Hardwood Floors throughout
Start to enjoy living in a handy spot in this sought after suburb, everything you need is within arm's reach - walking distance to public transport, shops and schools.

Leafy Lifestyle
Escape the chaos and retreat to your large 1006m2 (approx.) block in the leafy and peaceful suburb of Crib Point. This character filled home has an abundance of features, something for everyone in the family.
- 3 Bedrooms (with built in robes)
- 1007m2 (approx.) of land
- Huge garage/shed with workshop & undercover storage
- Separate bungalow retreat, ideal for teenagers/studio
- Easy access to the rear yard for boat/trailer/caravan storage
- Covered alfresco area
- New carpets and flooring throughout
The large garage/workshop provides the perfect escape for the handyman in the family, or alternatively all the storage space you could ask for. The rear yard is easily accessible for extra vehicle storage and gives the kids all the room to play. The outside separate bunglow is perfect for a teenagers retreat/man cave or for use as a studio.
Easy access to local shops, public transport and only a short drive to the busy town centre of Hastings or the popular Balnarring shops. Everything you need is at your fingertips.

address: Lot 2/5 Point Road Crib Point VIC 3919
description:
Expressions Of Interest - Rear Block
Located on approximately 620 sqm, this allotment offers prime location central to all that Crib Point offers.
With rear access, makes it perfect to accommodate boat/caravan. Take advantage now to build your dream home and secure your future.
Plans and permits available.

Sensational Family Entertainer With Impeccable Interiors On 1/4 Acre (Approx.)
Beautifully refurbished, this spacious family home offers style, versatility and comfort at every turn. Positioned in a desirable location which is highly sought-after by families, due to its close proximity to schools, transport, shops and sporting grounds.
~ Showcasing a well-designed floorplan, three spacious bedrooms with robes can be found on the lower level, including a master bedroom with a modern ensuite and ceiling fan. While the enormous parents retreat encompasses the entire top level, featuring a spacious walk-in-robe, ensuite, ceiling fan and a separate home office.
~ At the heart of the home is a well-equipped kitchen, complete with a breakfast bar, Fisher & Paykel dishwasher, Whirlpool oven and plenty of cupboard space.
~ The fabulous entertainer's alfresco offers an outdoor kitchen, BBQ, wine fridge and cafe blinds for year round enjoyment.
~ Finishing the lower level is a generous lounge room with high ceilings, a sitting room, formal dining area and an abundance of storage.
~ Climate controlled by zoned ducted heating and cooling throughout.
~ The double carport is fully enclosed with a roller door.
~ Further highlights include a 5k solar system, garden sheds and a chook pen.

Abundance Of Space And Style For The Whole Family On 920sqm (Approx.)
Designed, built and finished to impeccable standards, this spacious retreat promises a growing family years of enjoyment on approximately 920sqm.
With a location offering the best of both worlds - tranquility and proximity - you can enjoy peace and quiet while having the town centre, sporting grounds, schools and buses all at your fingertips!
~ A spacious parents retreat offering a walk-in-robe, ceiling fan, built-in-robes and a modern ensuite with a double vanity and bathtub.
~ The remaining king-sized bedrooms feature built-in-robes and ceiling fans.
~ The home office is a versatile space that can be utilized as a fifth bedroom or a third living space.
~ Gourmet, eat-in kitchen is appointed with stone benchtops, Westinghouse dishwasher, Delonghi oven, walk-in pantry, double fridge cavity and a breakfast bar.
~ The hub of the home is generously proportioned with open plan living and dining, and a separate theatre room.
~ French doors create a seamless connection to the outdoor terrace, perfect for entertaining friends and family, or to just relax and enjoy the serenity.
~ Detailed to the highest calibre with PVC double glazed windows, Karri hardwood floors and retractable fly screens.
~ Climate controlled by zoned ducted heating, refrigerated cooling and ceiling fans throughout.
~ The long list of extras include a double garage with internal access, 1.5kw solar system, 15000lt water tanks with pumps and a workshop with power.

Rustic Charmer with Huge Shed!
Offering the feeling of seclusion whilst maintaining a central location, this feel-good well presented
home is ideal for young families, downsizers and investors!
Features Include:
- Light and bright orientation
- Spacious open plan living and dining with coonara heating
- Sizeable bedrooms, 2 with built in robes
- Family bathroom plus powder room
- Tasteful renovations throughout
- Gourmet kitchen with plenty of bench/cupboard space
- Established native gardens
- Sun drenched deck to rear of property
- 9x7 Metre shed from side access to property
- Gas ducted heating and reverse cycle air con
Contact Sean Crimmins for further info
